page.title: 05Animals and birds
page.content: {Vet.}The vet in Leintwardine gets his equipment from Birmingham and Shrewsbury. He has lots of drugs and pills. He told us that he had treated a few wild animals such as Monkeys, Snakes,a Zebra,a Lion,a Tiger and some Chimpanzees,but not in Leintwardine. He has also had some birds of prey in like Kestrels,Falcons and Buzzards. He has had in some budgies and parrots. The vet has 8 to 100 animals a week to deal with. If he cannot deal with an animal he sends it to Bristol. {Pets.}Results of a local survey. There were 119 birds. Some people had aviaries. 41 fish _ some were tropical. We thought dogs and cats would be the most popular and we were surprised that there were 17 fowl. There were only 2 or 3 people that didn't have any animals.
